headline: Mondelz International to Participate at the Deutsche Bank Global Consumer Conference on June 4, 2025
summary: CHICAGO, May 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) today announced that Dirk Van de Put, Chief Executive Officer and Luca Zaramella, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat session at the Deutsche Bank Global Consumer Conference on Wednesday, June 4, 2025, at 08:30 a.m. CET. A listen-only webcast will be provided at www.mondelezinternational.com/investors and a replay of the event will also be available on the company's website. About Monde

headline: Mondelez International (NasdaqGS:MDLZ) Expands CLIF BUILDERS With New High-Protein Bar Flavors
summary: Mondelez International (NasdaqGS:MDLZ) saw a 7% rise in its share price over the last quarter, a period marked by significant product innovation and corporate activities. The launch of CLIF BUILDERS' new high-protein bars, including the OREO-flavored option, likely added positive momentum. Alongside, the introduction of limited-edition RITZ Sunkissed Crackers and the partnership with Sargento for premium cheese crackers enhanced product offerings. Despite a slight decline in net income and...

headline: The OREO Brand and Global Artist Selena Gomez Dream Up an Iconic New OREO Cookie by Selena, for Selenators
summary: The OREO brand is introducing the Limited Edition Selena Gomez OREO Cookies, a brand-new OREO cookie that brings together Selena's passions and fandom into one deliciously dunkable bite.
